developer.name: Suranga Nath Kasthurirathne
developer.organization: OpenMRS / Regenstrief Center for Biomedical Informatics

requireJavaVersion.message: The hapi-fhir Maven build requires JDK version 1.8 or higher.

replace.replacevalue: GitHub Project

<script type="text/javascript">
	var elements = document.getElementsByClassName("source");
	for (var i=0; i < elements.length; i++) {
		var pres = elements[i].getElementsByTagName("pre");
		for (var j = 0; j < pres.length; j++) {
			var pre = pres[j];
			if (pre.innerHTML.match(/^\s*\&lt\;/)) {
				pre.className = 'brush: xml';
			} else if (pre.innerHTML.match(/\/\*/)) {
				pre.className = 'brush: java';
			} else if (pre.innerHTML.match(/^\/\//)) {
				pre.className = 'brush: java';
			} else if (pre.innerHTML.match(/^\{/)) {
				pre.className = 'brush: jscript';
			} else if (pre.innerHTML.match(/^\#/)) {
				pre.className = 'brush: bash';
			} else if (pre.innerHTML.match(/\&lt\;\//)) {
				pre.className = 'brush: xml';
			} else {
				pre.className = 'brush: java';
			}
		}
	}

	SyntaxHighlighter.all();
</script>
</body>

target.echo: Adding Google analytics in target/site for <body>
Adding Google analytics in target/site for <BODY>
